addressCountry.description: The relevant country of the resource. For example, USA.

addressLocality.description: The locality; e.g., Mountain View, London, Moscow.

addressRegion.description: The region; e.g., CA, TX. Note(s): The relevant state, province, territory or other subdivision of a nation.

name.description: The name of the item. Note(s): NOTE: For the name of the hiring organization, use the subproperty legalName.

streetAddress.description: Street address; for example, "1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy".
